captions.text:
Peeking at you so no one 
would notice became my habit

Sometimes when our eyes meet 
I learned how to act normal

Action, I sometimes dream about 
Walking up to you and talking to you

Why do I freeze when you
Are in front of me?
I don't know why, girl

Oh My hairstyle is better than 
Other man
The new shirts I bought yesterday

Is like a perfect decalcomanie 
with the blue sky
Today I want to ask you out

Without my pride 
but it’s not easy

I just stare blankly at 
Some other place

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart 
I want you

Coz you are my 
Special girl
The chances I have to see you

Monday Tuesday Wednesday 
Thursday Friday

I want that bonus to 
see you on weekends

If I can see you 
coming to see me

I will give you everything, 
whatever it costs

To do that I need to have my own 
charm
To appeal to you

Because there are 
always guys around you
I gotta K.O him

Baby lean on me 
I won’t move if you are in my arms

I will give you everything 
I want to tell you

I will spend my time 
everyday only for you

But why is reality different 
from my heart

You don’t even know my name 
I pass by you quietly again

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart 
I want you

Coz you are my 
Special girl

You are beautiful spring summer 
fall and winter all seasons
After I saw you for the first time

your silhouette lingers even if 
I close my eyes

Yeah, So sweet, So sexy hey 
I can’t do anything because you
I’m All day All night long

Yeah, So sweet, So sexy ,hey 
I can’t do anything because you
I’m All day, All night long

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart
